thread.title: We can’t stop watching the underwater music video Natalie Portman filmed just days before she gave birth
thread.title_full: We can’t stop watching the underwater music video Natalie Portman filmed just days before she gave birth

author: Aly Horne
title: We can’t stop watching the underwater music video Natalie Portman filmed just days before she gave birth
text:
We can’t stop watching the underwater music video Natalie Portman filmed just days before she gave birth We’ve been looooving the pics of Natalie Portman at any red carpet event she attends looking radiant AF with her baby bump, but now we’ve got it on VIDEO. Natalie Portman starred in James Blake’s new music video for the song “My Willing Heart” and she looks totally amazing . We also love this low key acting gig for the super talented actress who probably has her pick of the litter in movie roles.
The music video for “My Willing Heart” was shot only days before Natalie gave birth t o her daughter, Amalia, so we imagine the video is pretty special to her too! The track was co-written by Frank Ocean and it’s from Blake’s latest album, The Colour in Anything, that came out a little less than a year ago.
Considering most of us only have grainy photographs and amateurish home videos to watch of our families before they were, y’know, our families, we’re sure Amalia is going to think this peek into her mom’s life just days before she was born is amazingly cool once she’s old enough to appreciate it.
We also love that this video was directed by a woman: Anna Rose Holmer. Congratulations to Natalie on both this stunning vid and her new little girl!
